description: This Java class defines the Ingredient entity for a recipe application, including fields for id, name, quantity, and a reference to the associated Recipe. It uses JPA annotations for ORM mapping and includes constructors, getters, and setters.

classes.name: Ingredient
classes.description: Represents an ingredient in a recipe, with properties for id, name, quantity, and a link to its parent recipe.

methods.name: Ingredient
methods.description: Parameterized constructor to create an Ingredient with specified name, quantity, and associated recipe.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the ingredient.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the ID of the ingredient.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the ingredient.

methods.name: setName
methods.description: Sets the name of the ingredient.

methods.name: getQuantity
methods.description: Returns the quantity of the ingredient.

methods.name: setQuantity
methods.description: Sets the quantity of the ingredient.
